code: import React from'react';import{BalanceBlock}from"../common";function approval(approve,reject){return approve.multipliedBy(10000).dividedToIntegerBy(approve.plus(reject)).dividedBy(100);}function participation(approve,reject,totalStake){return approve.plus(reject).multipliedBy(10000).dividedToIntegerBy(totalStake).dividedBy(100);}var VoteHeader=function VoteHeader(_ref){var approveFor=_ref.approveFor,rejectFor=_ref.rejectFor,totalStake=_ref.totalStake,showParticipation=_ref.showParticipation;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{padding:'2%',display:'flex',alignItems:'center'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{width:'25%'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(BalanceBlock,{asset:"Approve",balance:approveFor,suffix:"QSG"})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{width:'25%'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(BalanceBlock,{asset:"Reject",balance:rejectFor,suffix:"QSG"})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{width:'25%'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(BalanceBlock,{asset:"Approval",balance:approval(approveFor,rejectFor),suffix:"%"})),showParticipation?/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{width:'25%'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(BalanceBlock,{asset:"Participation",balance:participation(approveFor,rejectFor,totalStake),suffix:"%"})):'');};export default VoteHeader;
